snippet.title: Wytchwood - Official Android and iOS Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the whimsical world of Wytchwood and take a look at gameplay and more from this crafting adventure game set in an expressive land of gothic fables and fairytales. Wytchwood is available now on Android via Google Play and iOS through the App Store. Wytchwood is also available now on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox, and PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store.

As the mysterious old witch of the woods, you will explore a strange countryside, collect magical ingredients, brew sorcerous enchantments, and pass their twisted judgment upon a capricious cast of characters and creatures in Wytchwood. After all, how will they ever learn if someone doesn’t teach them the moral of the story?
